Pages on the site end up in redirect loops in Firefox.
After the cookie popup is managed and disappears, a semi-transparent overlay remains on the page which prevents further interaction with the site.

Opt out is broken on the US version of the site
CMP gets incorrectly handled / repeatedly opens tabs
Generally poor UX - no username saved on signup, prompts for Duck address on 'forgot password'.
Performance issue for too many fields.
Warnings are already displayed before embedded YouTube videos are loaded.
Video pauses at about 13-15 seconds in. Playing the video again results in a single frame rendering without progressing to the next frame.

excludedCookieDomains.reason: On some Google sign-in flows, there is an error after entering username and proceeding: 'Your browser has cookies disabled. Make sure that your cookies are enabled and try again.'
After sign-in for Google Pay flows, there is repeated flickering and a loading spinner, preventing the flow from proceeding.
After sign-in for Google Pay flows (after flickering is resolved), blocking this causes the loading spinner to spin indefinitely, and the payment flow cannot proceed.

exceptions.reason: Clicking 'Continue' after filling out details for account creation yields an error.

omitApplicationSites.reason: Site loads blank and does not proceed.
Homepage UI elements appear squashed together, preventing interaction with the site.
Navigation section at the top of the main page renders as text.
When going to the main login page, there is a banner at the top which warns of an 'Unsupported browser'.
A banner at the bottom which warns of an 'Unsupported browser' and interferes with rest of the UI.
Stream page shows an incompatibility warning and does not load further.

exceptions.reason: When adding an item to the cart, there is an error 'An unexpected problem occurred' and the item is not added to the cart.
When adding an item to the cart, there is an error 'An unexpected problem occurred' and the item is not added to the cart.
After filling out flight information and clicking 'Search flights', a blank page is shown for several seconds before the page redirects.
When adding an item to cart, there is an error 'something went wrong', and the item does not get added to the cart.

When creating an account, after filling out details and going to e-mail confirmation, there is an error 'Something went wrong', and the e-mail may not be received. Clicking 'Send new code' appears successful, but after entering the code there is often another account creation error.
When attempting to sign in, a semi-transparent overlay appears over the page which prevents further interaction with the site.
After filling out travel info and clicking 'Get times & tickets', there is an error warning that 'Something went wrong', which prevents further interaction.
Clicking 'add to cart' causes a spinner to load briefly, and the item doesn't get added to the cart.
After entering login details and clicking to log in, the site shows an adwall and prevents login.
Site loads blank and does not proceed.

rules.reason: Adwall displays over video and prevents video from being played.

Example URL: https://www.corriere.it/video-articoli/2022/07/13/missione-wwf-liberare-mare-plastica/9abb64de-029d-11ed-a0cc-ad3c68cacbae.shtml; Clicking on the video to play causes a still frame to show and the video does not continue.
Videos show a spinner and never load.

corriere.it -  Example URL: https://www.corriere.it/video-articoli/2022/07/13/missione-wwf-liberare-mare-plastica/9abb64de-029d-11ed-a0cc-ad3c68cacbae.shtml; Clicking on the video to play causes a still frame to show and the video does not continue. eurogamer.net, seattletimes.com - An unskippable adwall appears which prevents interaction with the page. wcvb.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/1088
Site loads blank and cannot be interacted with.

Example URL1: https://www.beretta.com/en-us/womens-clothing/caps-and-hats/; Example URL2: https://www.beretta.com/en-us/mens-clothing/caps-and-hats/lp-trucker-hat/; Various product and product-related images do not render - e.g., main product images on product pages, product images in product listings, etc.
See https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/321. These requests are associated with map/location functionality on websites.

On the homepage (drudgereport.com), some images are fetched from bing.com. When we block these requests, the images do not render, and the page appears to have blank boxes. Note that requests can be of the form th.bing.com/th?id=... or th.bing.com/th/id/..., hence we unblock the common path here.
See https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/321. This request is associated with map/location functionality on websites.
See https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/321. This request is associated with map/location auto-suggest functionality on websites.
See https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/321. This request is associated with map/location functionality on websites.
See https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/321. These requests are associated with map/location functionality on websites.
Opinion section article elements do not render. Note that Firefox Enhanced Tracking Protection may prevent mitigation from succeeding on Firefox.
ah.nl - 'Bonus offer' elements do not render and are not clickable. rocketnews24.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/846

nhl.com - Videos show a spinner and never load. viki.com - after a video has played for a few seconds an adwall pops up. Clicking 'I've turned off my adblocker' resets the video, then after a few seconds the adwall pops up again. rocketnews24.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/846 crunchyroll.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/1140
cbssports.com - Live videos do not load or render. rocketnews24.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/846

ah.nl - 'Bonus offer' elements do not render and are not clickable. wunderground.com - Video element does not display. rocketnews24.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/846
bandsintown.com - Ticket page renders blank. With this exception the page redirects to ticketspice.com. nextdoor.co.uk, nextdoor.com - Facebook login option appears greyed out and cannot be clicked.

doterra.com - For doterra.com/login/loading, the page shows a loading indicator and never redirects. easyjet.com - Clicking 'Show Worldwide flights' after entering parameters for a worldwide flight in the flight viewing form does nothing.

ah.nl - 'Bonus offer' elements do not render and are not clickable. aeromexico.com, al.com, bbcgoodfood.com, garnethill.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/921 dailyherald.com - Article images render as grey boxes. emirates.com - After filling out login details and clicking to proceed, a loading spinners shows on the proceed button and the login does not progress. iltalehti.fi - Article video renders as a blank box. kingarthurbaking.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/348 pickfu.com - https://github.com/duckduckgo/privacy-configuration/issues/346 rbcroyalbank.com - Investments page renders blank.

Instagram embeds as main article content render as grey boxes.

brooksrunning.com - When switching between product variants (e.g., different shoe colours) a loading spinner shows and the variant does not load. joann.com - When switching between product variants (e.g., different shirt colours) the page shows an overlay and further interaction is prevented.
When attempting to create an account (after filling out registration form and clicking 'Register'), there is an 'access timed out' warning, and account creation does not proceed.
Navigation bar at top of site does not display, preventing easy access to e.g., site login. Note that this CNAMEs to iservprod.medicare.gov.edgekey.net at time of mitiagtion.

Accounts page renders blank. Download buttons show loading stars and never finish loading. Pricing information doesn't load. Note that cdn.accounts.nintendo.com CNAMEs to star.accounts.nintendo.com.edgekey.net at the time of mitigation.

Live videos do not load or render.
Product images on the main page don't render. Note that this CNAMEs to marvel-b4-cdn.bc0a.com at time of mitigation.
Images in the large scrolling image banner on main page do not render. Note that this CNAMEs to marvel-b4-cdn.bc0a.com at time of mitigation.
